item.title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps Star Addresses Potential Silver Surfer MCU Spinoff Movie
item.description: As Julia Garner will bring Silver Surfer to life in The Fantastic Four: First Steps, the actress discusses the concept of an MCU spinoff movie.

item.title: How To Watch All Wolverine Movies In Chronological Order & By Release Date
item.description: Hugh Jackman’s Wolverine has starred in 9 X-Men movies, with a long and complex timeline that will culminate in the MCU’s Deadpool & Wolverine.

item.title: I Am Obsessed With These Fan Theories On How Stu Macher Could Return For Scream 7 (Now That Matthew Lillard's Casting Is Confirmed)
item.description: There are a lot of ways Stu Macher could return in Scream 7 now that Matthew Lillard is confirmed for the movie.
